actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To amend the Metropolitan Washington Airports Act of 1986 to provide for reorganization of the Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority and for local review of proposed actions of the Airports Authority affecting aircraft noise.
short_title: Metropolitan Washington Airports Act Amendments of 1991

summary.text: Metropolitan Washington Airports Act Amendments of 1991 - Amends the Metropolitan Washington Airports Act of 1986 to make certain changes to congressional findings with regard to the transfer of Federal management authority over Metropolitan Washington Airports (Washington National Airport and Washington Dulles International Airport) to the local and State level. Makes changes to the composition and the term of appointment of the members of the board of directors of the Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority. Requires such members to hold elective political office while serving on the board (currently, members cannot hold elective or appointive political office). Requires certain board and Airports Authority actions to be reviewed by specified congressional committees. Prohibits board actions which could result in a change in the impact of aircraft noise in the vicinity of a Metropolitan Washington Airport from taking effect unless the board notifies, and submits such actions for review by, a specified committee of the Washington Council of Governments.

titles.title: Metropolitan Washington Airports Act Amendments of 1991

To amend the Metropolitan Washington Airports Act of 1986 to provide for reorganization of the Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority and for local review of proposed actions of the Airports Authority affecting aircraft noise.
